original_text: But he denied it. “I don’t know or understand what you’re talking about,” he said, and went out into the entryway.
korean_text: 베드로가 부인하여 이르되 나는 네가 말하는 것이 무엇인지 알지도 못하고 깨닫지도 못하겠노라 하며 앞뜰로 나갈새6)

sentences.original_text: or understand what you're talking about
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 당신이 무엇에 대해 말하는지 이해하지 못한다

sentences.original_text: and went out into the entryway.
